name: MTLStepFunction
desc: The frequency with which a function fetches attribute data.

items.name: case constant
items.desc: The function fetches attribute data once.

items.name: case perInstance
items.desc: The function fetches data based on the instance index.

items.name: case perPatch
items.desc: The post-tessellation function fetches data based on the patch index of the patch.

items.name: case perPatchControlPoint
items.desc: The post-tessellation function fetches data based on the control-point indices associated with the patch.

items.name: case perVertex
items.desc: The vertex function fetches data for every vertex.

items.name: case threadPositionInGridX
items.desc: The compute function fetches data based on the thread's x coordinate.

items.name: case threadPositionInGridY
items.desc: The compute function fetches data based on the thread's y coordinate.

items.name: case threadPositionInGridXIndexed
items.desc: The compute function fetches data by using the thread's x coordinate to look up a value in the index buffer.

items.name: case threadPositionInGridYIndexed
items.desc: The compute function fetches data by using the thread's y coordinate to look up a value in the index buffer.
